title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
00:28 <vmassol> has quit  
01:06 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
03:25 <abusenius> has quit  
03:49 <DrLou> has quit  
04:49 <jamesxu> has joined #xwiki  
04:51 <jamesxu> Hi, could anyone tell me which Java object the velocity code "$xwiki.getDocument($docname)" return, could you give me the github url?  
04:52 <@cjdelisle> It returns a com.xpn.xwiki.api.Document  
04:53 <@cjdelisle> you can check with any type of object by doing (for example) $xwiki.getDocument($docname).getClass()  
04:54 <@cjdelisle> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/api/Document.java  
04:54 <@cjdelisle> there's the source code  
04:54 <jamesxu> Thanks  
04:54 <@cjdelisle> sure thing  
05:48 <jamesxu> has quit

13:23 <qwebirc88595> hello

13:25 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
14:42 <abusenius> has quit  
14:44 <cjdelisle> has quit  
14:46 <cjdelisle> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <Tsuna\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <Tsuna\_> hello  
15:02 <Tsuna\_> is there someone ?  
15:05 <Tsuna\_> I would like to create a macro in my xwiki which ask for a file, attach it to the page and after do some work with the link of this file, but for now I have to attach the file manualy, right click on the link (copy the adress) launch my macro and past the link into a string box. How can I do all this automaticly ?  
15:20 <cjdelisle> has quit  
15:23 <cjdelisle> has joined #xwiki  
15:38 <@sdumitriu> Hi Tsuna\_  
15:38 <@sdumitriu> You can look at the code for the attachment picker macro  
15:39 <@sdumitriu> Should be in XWiki/AttachmentSelector  
15:42 <Tsuna\_> thanks  
15:52 <abusenius> has quit  
15:55 <Tsuna\_> doncument not found :s  
15:56 <@sdumitriu> That's new since XE 3.0  
15:56 <@sdumitriu> What version are you using?  
15:56 <Tsuna\_> 2.7  
15:57 <@sdumitriu> You can find the sources here: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/master/xwiki-enterprise-wiki/src/main/resources/XWiki/AttachmentSelector.xml  
15:58 <Tsuna\_> thanks  
16:00 <Tsuna\_> I'll take a look on it  
16:01 <Tsuna\_> has quit
